notesStmt.note: Folios more or less mutilated, cut from different codices. The recto of the leaf is much soiled, the writing is partly obliterated. The upper half of the third column is mutilated. Top of the folio 7 is cut off as well as the lower margin of folio 9. Ink partly faded.
Manuscript description based on Margoliouth, G.: Catalogue of the Hebrew and Samaritan Manuscripts in the British Museum, London 1965.

msContents.summary: Biblical fragments accompanied with Aramaic targum.
